name: Outro
_source: speak;Natasha;Yes, yes it was...|Thank you so much.|I don't know how to repay--
speak;Natasha;Yes...|My name is Natasha.|I was a servant of the people at Grado's Imperial Temple.
speak;Eirika;Then why the trouble with the soldiers?|Would you tell us your story?

speak;Natasha;Of course...{br}A few days past, my mentor was arrested without warning.|They executed him...|They said he was a traitor...|But those were false accusations.{br}The empereor had him killed--a holy man!--to keep him silent.
speak;Natasha;Yes.|My mentor told me with his final breath.|The emperor plans to destory the Sacred Stones.

speak;Natasha;As you must know, the Sacred Stones drove back the power of evil long ago.|Even now, each of our nations is home to one of these legendary treasures.|There's one in my homeland, Grado, and one in your Renais...
speak;Eirika;Yes, the Sacred Stone of Renais is still housed in our royal temple.
speak;Natasha;The emperor plans to destroy the five stones, one by one...
speak;Seth;Why would he do such a thing?|Legend says the Sacred Stones are even now all the keeps evil at bay!

speak;Natasha;I cannot begin to guess his motives...|You must know, our emperor was gentle man.|But one day, he changed...|Utterly...|Before my mentor died, he said the keepers of the Sacred Stones must be warned.|I tried to slip across the border, but the soldiers spotted me...
speak;Eirika;Is that what happened...|What do you think Seth?

speak;Seth;I think we can trust no one from Grado.|Not in these times.|Not without proof.{br}However, if what she says is true, we cannot ignore the danger we face.|Destroying the Sacred Stones...|We cannot allow that to happen.
speak;Eirika;I agree.|If only we knew if there were some reason for the empereor's actions.|I must tell you, her story chills me to the bone.|I pray it is false...
if;game.game_vars['Ch.5_Village_1'] ==  True and game.game_vars['Ch.5_Village_2'] == True and game.game_vars['Ch.5_Village_3'] == True and game.game_vars['Ch.5_Village_4'] == True
speak;Man2;A moment please.|Are you perchance...|Princess Eirika?

speak;Man2;Oh...|Thank goodness you're safe!|I can't tell you how happy I am.|And please accept my gratitude for driving off that Captain Saar.|That Saar treated all the citizens of Renais with such contempt and brutatlity...
speak;Eirika;Not here...|Not in this city...|My brother and I spent such happy times here with Lyon...
speak;Man2;I beg your pardon, but it will not be long before Grado send more troops.|Please, you must go quickly.
speak;Eirika;I'm so sorry.|There's nothing I can do for you now.|Please forgive me.

speak;Man2;Do not be troubled.|Princess Eirika...|We will survive and wait for the day of liberation to come.|There will come a day when you, Prince Ephraim, and all of Renais rise up.|Until that day of glory comes, we will wait unbowed and filled with hope.
